title: SimpleMachin34
author: SimpleMachin34
content: Hello,Loan Amount: 2 LTC or 0,0048 BTCLoan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: +20% Loan Repay Date: 29th September 2023Type of Collateral: steam account with over 4.5k$ in skins and over 40k$ in stickers: https://steamcommunity.com/id/dypperpt/inventoryLTC address: MB5ee1FanHmN9WDvp3AkMfgL477BpESdMEBTC address: 36pGEeKe7GyV6SMBt8srDmLsCZxShRup5SPM to give you my steam acc login/pw and email aswell.

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.body: I am not familiar with Steam accounts even that I got myself one with some gamesÂ  But isn't that easy for you to just claim back after you giving out the information and got the loan?I am not a lender so it's not up to me, I just asked. Anyway good luck.

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.created_time: November 06, 2023, 08:28:18 PMLast edit: November 15, 2023, 07:36:18 AM by BabyBandit
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 05, 2023, 04:39:44 PMQuote from: SimpleMachin34 on September 21, 2023, 09:28:08 AMHello,Loan Amount: 2 LTC or 0,0048 BTCLoan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: +20% Loan Repay Date: 29th September 2023Type of Collateral: steam account with over 4.5k$ in skins and over 40k$ in stickers: https://steamcommunity.com/id/dypperpt/inventoryLTC address: MB5ee1FanHmN9WDvp3AkMfgL477BpESdMEBTC address: 36pGEeKe7GyV6SMBt8srDmLsCZxShRup5SPM to give you my steam acc login/pw and email aswell.If you can Send me all the content to my userid I provide the loanand escrow Â is acceptedI would not make a deal with this user AceBetGroup. For what's it worth I think it's a attempt to try to steal the skins, and yes I see that Escrow is accepted, but that just a fake sense of security since in PM or somewhere else he probably would try to avoid it.1. 01 November 2023, 06:23:33 - Registered on the forum. 2. 01 November 2023, 08:09:25 - Asking for a $4500 USD loan here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5472383.msg63085605#msg630856053. 02 November 2023, 01:45:07 - Start to offer a service "(Traffic) Exclusive SEO Service Packages Tailored to Your Budget!4. 02 November 2023, 05:18:09 - Offer a new service again "ðŸ“Œ[TOP] Supercharge ðŸ”¥ Your Group Chat Engagement with Our Pro ChattersðŸ’¬ðŸ’»!"Nothing strange in that expect the early loan request right? And then...5. 02 November 2023, 17:07:09 - Creating this topic: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5472550.msg63092270#msg63092270Where he lost his BTC and now he are in need to create a gambling operation so he can pay hes rent next month.6. 06 November 2023, 00:39:44  - And now he want to lend out money where its maybe is a collateral involved?!Obvious it's not a group or a company behind the UID more likely it's a desperate person that is totally empty and need money for whatever reason. Right or wrong is not up to me to judge I leave that to others, but if OP is serious about his request I want to warn him.- Regards BabyB. ðŸ‘¼
